get_entry

Source: R/entry_functions.R
get_entry.Rd

This function fetches detailed information for a Fantasy Premier League entry given the entry ID(s). IMPORTANT NOTE: FPL generally asks scrapers NOT to abuse the /entry sites (see: https://fantasy.premierleague.com/robots.txt).

get_entry(entryid = NULL)

Arguments

entryid

The entry ID(s). Can be found on the FPL website under 'Gameweek history' in the URL - https://fantasy.premierleague.com/a/entry/XXXXXX/history.

Examples

get_entry(1076)
#> $entry
#> $entry$id
#> [1] 1076
#> 
#> $entry$player_first_name
#> [1] "Rasmus"
#> 
#> $entry$player_last_name
#> [1] "Christensen"
#> 
#> $entry$player_region_id
#> [1] 58
#> 
#> $entry$player_region_name
#> [1] "Denmark"
#> 
#> $entry$player_region_short_iso
#> [1] "DK"
#> 
#> $entry$summary_overall_points
#> [1] 1878
#> 
#> $entry$summary_overall_rank
#> [1] 11142
#> 
#> $entry$summary_event_points
#> [1] 42
#> 
#> $entry$summary_event_rank
#> [1] 923657
#> 
#> $entry$joined_seconds
#> [1] 402
#> 
#> $entry$current_event
#> [1] 31
#> 
#> $entry$total_transfers
#> [1] 33
#> 
#> $entry$total_loans
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $entry$total_loans_active
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $entry$transfers_or_loans
#> [1] "transfers"
#> 
#> $entry$deleted
#> [1] FALSE
#> 
#> $entry$email
#> [1] FALSE
#> 
#> $entry$joined_time
#> [1] "2018-07-05T14:45:37Z"
#> 
#> $entry$name
#> [1] "Ji-Sung Park the Bus"
#> 
#> $entry$bank
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $entry$value
#> [1] 1036
#> 
#> $entry$kit
#> [1] "{\"kit_shirt_type\":\"plain\",\"kit_shirt_base\":\"#13c11f\",\"kit_shirt_sleeves\":\"#13c11f\",\"kit_shirt_secondary\":\"#e1e1e1\",\"kit_shirt_logo\":\"none\",\"kit_shorts\":\"#fcf7f7\",\"kit_socks_type\":\"hoops\",\"kit_socks_base\":\"#13c11f\",\"kit_socks_secondary\":\"#e1e1e1\"}"
